mapper.select: SELECT b.id, c.id AS billboardId, c.title, c.amount, a.create_at AS createAt, b.`status`, a.read_flag AS readFlag FROM t_message a LEFT JOIN t_billboard_economic_related AS b ON a.pid = b.id LEFT JOIN t_billboard AS c ON c.id = b.billboard_id WHERE a.user_id = #{createBy} AND a.type = #{type} order by a.create_at desc
